Uses of Interface
com.dhemery.publishing.Publisher

Packages that use Publisher
com.dhemery.expressing Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met. 
com.dhemery.network Send and receive network messages. 
com.dhemery.os Run operating system commands. 
com.dhemery.publishing Publish and subscribe to publications. 
 

Uses of Publisher in com.dhemery.expressing
 

Constructors in com.dhemery.expressing with parameters of type Publisher
PublishingCondition(Condition condition, Publisher publisher)
          Wraps the given condition to publish the result of each evaluation.
 

Uses of Publisher in com.dhemery.network
 

Constructors in com.dhemery.network with parameters of type Publisher
PublishingResource(Publisher publisher, Resource resource)
          Create a wrapper that uses the given publisher to publish events about the given resource.
PublishingResourceFactory(Publisher publisher, ResourceFactory resources)
          Create resource factory that wraps another factory's Resources in PublishingResource wrappers.
 

Uses of Publisher in com.dhemery.os
 

Constructors in com.dhemery.os with parameters of type Publisher
PublishingCommand(Publisher publisher, RunnableCommand command)
          Wrap the given command and publish events when it runs.
PublishingCommandFactory(Publisher publisher, OSCommandFactory<RunnableCommand> commands)
          Create a resource factory that wraps another factory's OSCommands in PublishingCommand wrappers.
PublishingProcess(Publisher publisher, OSCommand command, OSProcess process)
          Wrap the given process and publish events when its PublishingProcess.output() method is called.
 

Uses of Publisher in com.dhemery.publishing
 

Subinterfaces of Publisher in com.dhemery.publishing
 interface Channel
          A channel through which publishers can publish publications to subscribers.
 

Classes in com.dhemery.publishing that implement Publisher
 class MethodSubscriptionChannel
          A channel through which subscribers receive publications via methods annotated by Subscribe.
 class NullPublisher
          A publisher that does nothing.
